DOC.brief_summary: This study , post-marketing commitment Food Drug Administration , design detect effect raxibacumab anthrax vaccine adsorb ( AVA ) immunogenicity healthy volunteer population . This randomized , open-label , parallel group , two arm study compare immunogenicity AVA 4 week first AVA dose , AVA administer alone concomitantly raxibacumab . The study plan enroll approximately 30 534 subject 3 cohort . The total duration study approximately 26 week . The date reflect cohort 1 .
